sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return (

Dashboard

{user.role === 'FREELANCER' && (

Welcome, {user.name}

Manage your profile, browse projects, and grow your freelance business.

Update Profile

Keep your skills and portfolio up to date

Browse Projects

Find projects that match your skills

)} {user.role === 'CLIENT' && (

Welcome, {user.name}

Post projects, find talented freelancers, and manage your work.

Post a Project

Create a new project and find talent

My Projects

Manage your existing projects

Find Freelancers

Browse talented professionals

)} {user.role === 'ADMIN' && (

Admin Dashboard

Manage users, projects, and platform settings.

Go to Admin Panel
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
